vote.priority_1: Session memory system (Council legge ultimi N completed automaticamente)
vote.priority_2: Automated changelog generator (da Done-List → markdown readable)
vote.reasoning: The session memory system directly amplifies the core collaborative intelligence, making every interaction more context-aware. The changelog generator is a high-leverage automation that turns raw data into useful project history. The dashboard, while valuable for oversight, is slightly less urgent than foundational memory and documentation systems already in motion.

new_idea.title: PUCK-CLI: Terminal Interface for Project Management
new_idea.description: A command-line tool to query project status, log completed work, and trigger Council sessions directly from the terminal, streamlining the workflow for technical users.
